text:
Tumhari Paakhi is an Indian television Soap opera., created by Sumeet Hukamchand Mittal. It is produced by the Shashi Sumeet Productions. And writed by Saratchand Chattopadhyay. It is broadcast on Life OK wich will be premiered on 11 November 2013 to 21 November 2014. The show stars Shraddha Arya and Mohammed Iqbal Khan in lead roles.
Cast.
Tej Sapru as Mr. Rana, Tanya's father
